# Runs an SQL Test Script, presumably generated by DBT Utility


 [Source code](run_testcwl_src.md) 


```{contents}
---
local:
---
```

**Tool**. Runs: [nsaph.dbt.dbt_runner](../../../core-platform/doc/members/dbt_runner)

## Description

Executes a test script from a given SQL file.
The test is presumed to have been generated by DBT Utility


## Inputs

| Name            | Type   | Default | Description                                                      | 
|:----------------|:-------|:--------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------|
| database        | File   |         | Path to database connection file, usually database.ini           | 
| connection_name | string |         | The name of the section in the database.ini file                 | 
| script          | File   |         |                                                                  | 
| depends_on      | Any?   |         | a special field used to enforce dependencies and execution order | 

## Outputs

| Name   | Type   | Description | 
|:-------|:-------|:------------|
| log    | File   |             | 
| errors | stderr |             |
